message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $17,000. This is a great deal, considering the product is worth $10,000 to you, and I'm confident you'll get a lot of value out of it.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but $17,000 is a bit too high for me. Considering the value to me, I'm willing to pay $12,000. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.
I understand that $12,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $14,000. This is a fair price that I think we can both agree on.
